application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Lime - Approx 18m in height with a 6m lateral spread. Proposed Works: Reduce in height by 2.5m and laterally by 0.5m to shape leaving a height of 15.5m and a spread of 5.5m. Minor thin of no more than 10% through crown and any deadwood removed.T2 - Lime - Approx 18m in height with a 6m lateral spread. Proposed Works: Reduce in height by 2.5m and laterally by 0.5m to shape leaving a height of 15.5m and a spread of 5.5m. Minor thin of no more than 10% through crown and any deadwood removed.T3 - Lime - Approx 18m in height with a 6m lateral spread. Proposed Works: Reduce in height by 2.5m and laterally by 0.5m to shape leaving a height of 15.5m and a spread of 5.5m. Minor thin of no more than 10% through crown and any deadwood removed.T4 - Lime - Approx 18m in height with a 6m lateral spread. Proposed Works: Reduce in height by 2.5m and laterally by 0.5m to shape leaving a height of 15.5m and a spread of 5.5m. Minor thin of no more than 10% through crown and any deadwood removed.
